page.title: 12AIRYHALL LIBRARY, ABERDEEN
page.content: Opened in 1969, iryhall is the largest and busiest branch library, opening for 61 hours per week. Total membership is 8562. They have almost 2000 records and usually 900 are out on loan at one time. The Library has 115 prints, 85 of which are normally out on loan. The annual issue for the branch is 224902 averaging 73 per hour. There is a branch librarian and 3 full time library assistants. The branch stocks newspapers and Periodicals and was the first branch to be linked to the Central library by computer and to the Town House for membership information. Their busiest day is Saturday. They have books for every age group- adults preferring fiction or romance and children adventure books. There are also areas for study and a children's section.
